data.name: lbl10Resource1.Text
data.value: Just like any person who is born is issued a national Identification (ID), a Corporation or company is also recognized and registered on a national and issued an (ID). On behalf of the corporation and by having a POWER OF ATTORNEY, ICLAC will register and pursue the legal issues as explained below:

data.name: lbl1Resource1.Text
data.value: Based on REGISTRATION law, the Iranian Government only recognizes the owner of property /assets with the “property deed “officially registered to the person’s name. BORHANSHAR offers the services of obtaining a replacement deed in cases where the owner has lost the “deed”. In case of selling the property to a new owner and change of title of the DEED, there are certain specific laws regarding the issue as explained below:

data.name: lbl2Resource1.Text
data.value: -Stop or halt order on “change of Title “of property.

data.name: lbl3Resource1.Text
data.value: -The existence of third party rights as in a “ lease “ contract.

data.name: lbl4Resource1.Text
data.value: -The existence of “ TRESSPASSING “ documents and also the existence of any legal claim as a third party and …

data.name: lbl5Resource1.Text
data.value: -To implement maps.

data.name: lbl6Resource1.Text
data.value: -To eliminate the third parties as “ TRESSPASSERS “.

data.name: lbl7Resource1.Text
data.value: - breakdown report or separation list of related reports

data.name: lbl8Resource1.Text
data.value: - Partitioning or separation report of shared items of property or assets… which could each be separately explained in legal registration format.

data.name: lbl9Resource1.Text
data.value: Corporate REGISTRATION issues:

data.name: lblTitleResource1.Text
data.value: Registration Affairs

data.name: PageResource1.Title
data.value: SELf/Registration Affairs

data.name: lbl11Resource1.Text
data.value: -To officially register a non-commercial/private company from the very beginning stages.

data.name: lbl12Resource1.Text
data.value: - To register a branch of company or organization.

data.name: lbl13Resource1.Text
data.value: -To register the Managing Director, the managers, and the judges in cases where they need to be registered.

data.name: lbl14Resource1.Text
data.value: -To register any changes in company’s address or statute.

data.name: lbl15Resource1.Text
data.value: -To officially SEAL the accounting books.

data.name: lbl16Resource1.Text
data.value: -To officially register the Balance sheets and income statements.

data.name: lbl17Resource1.Text
data.value: Company LOGO and TRADE MARK registration

data.name: lbl18Resource1.Text
data.value: In order to be lawfully protected, any company logo or company trademarks must be officially registered. ICLAC offers the following services regarding this issue:

data.name: lbl19Resource1.Text
data.value: -To register the Trademark or Commercial corporate name.

data.name: lbl20Resource1.Text
data.value: -To protest or object to any other similar registration logo or trademarks.

data.name: lbl21Resource1.Text
data.value: -To object or pursue the case in court of law in regards to misuse of name/logo/trade mark used by a third party and to claim any damages caused.

data.name: lbl22Resource1.Text
data.value: -To transfer or change the corporate name/ logo or trade mark.

data.name: lbl23Resource1.Text
data.value: - To register the company logo or trademarks in other countries.
